column4: got error while compiling "configure: error: --enable-application=APP is required"
got error while compiling thunderbird "configure: error: --enable-application=APP is required"
If you can't figure that out yourself, maybe buiilding it yourself isn't the path you should follow?
sudo apt-get install thunderbird may be more your speed.
but i want to compile it
THen go learn; presumably on a package with fewer dependencies. But begging for help in IRC isn't "learning" by any stretch,
Just for my own curiosity, what's your configure line?
./configure; make; make install isn't how you install Thunderbird.
then how do i install it
It took me fifteen seconds of googling to figure that out.
